U

unlockIt() - Method in class mig.core.Bolt
Method to unlock the Bolt It will set the private parameter locked to false
unlockIt() - Method in class mig.core.Code
Method to unlock the chest if the parameter good_pass is true It is an Overriding of the unlockIt method from the parent class Bolt
unlockIt() - Method in class mig.core.Lock
Method for opening the lock if the key is compatible with the lock It only works if the parameter good_key is true
up_down - Variable in class mig.view.DirectionPanel
 
update() - Method in class mig.view.BackPack
Display the picture of the item recovered instead of the default icon.
update() - Method in class mig.view.CheckButton
This method check if there is an item in the room or not.
update() - Method in class mig.view.ConsoleArea
Method to display the message for denounce a murderer.
update() - Method in class mig.view.DenounceButton
Method to activate the button for to denounce the murderer.
update() - Method in class mig.view.LetDownButton
 
update() - Method in class mig.view.SpeakButton
Update for the JButton to know if the button is enabled or not According to the statement if the room has npcs or not
update() - Method in class mig.view.Window
Method that updates the window of the game after each action made by the player.
updateAccess() - Method in class mig.view.DirectionPanel
Method to activated the button of the direction.
updateRoomImage() - Method in class mig.view.Window
Method that updates the the visual renders (main picture and side plan) of the room where the player currently is
updateTitle() - Method in class mig.view.PrincipalWindow
Method updateTitle Update the name of the game with the name of the player and the current room

This URL allows to assign a basic picture in the JLabel when there is no item.
url - Variable in class mig.view.Bunch
This URL allows to display the picture with three keys.
